Sentencas: The conductivity of a tubular micro solid oxide fuel cell (TSOFC) anode is measured in-situ.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The Ni/YSZ composite anode was fabricated using the electrophoretic deposition (EPD) technique.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The four-probe method is used to measure the conductivity of several samples simultaneously under a reducing atmosphere during several cycles of heating, approximate to 100h dwelling and cooling periods.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Special attention is paid to maintaining similar fabrication and thermal histories among the samples.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Despite all this, the measured conductivities show substantial variation and degradation from sample to sample and from one thermal cycle to the next.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: The most variations occur during the reduction of the cell, with significant oscillations in the measurements.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Sample conductivities exhibit step-like changes during the cooling and heat-up cycles.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: A theory based on thermal expansion induced Ni particles connection formation and breakage within the YSZ backbone is proposed.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Sample electron microscope micrographs are presented showing island-like segregated Ni particles within a continuous YSZ structure.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition

Sentencas: Eliminating such effects not only will reduce the cell performance variability but will also increase the peak power by 60%, according to our simulation results.
Titulo: Evolution of electronic conductivity in a Ni/YSZ electrode fabricated by electrophoretic deposition
